About Me

I am Mutesa Willy, an independent Rwandan Creative Front-End Developer with 3+ years of experience working in agencies. I’ve collaborated with international clients to deliver engaging, responsive, and aesthetic digital experiences. Currently focusing on freelance collaborations and partnerships with agencies that share my passion for creativity and excellence.

Scroll to Education

Liquidnet Family High School @Agahozo-Shalom Youth Village

Agahozo-Shalom Youth Village (ASYV) is one of Rwanda's leading high schools and a vibrant community dedicated to empowering youth. It offers a comprehensive education that focuses on academic excellence and personal development. My primary studies at ASYV include Mathematics, Physics, Computer Science, and more, equipping me with essential skills and knowledge for future endeavors.

Web Development, Design, and Content Creation

Skilled in web design, UI design, and static website development, with expertise in Front-End development. Proficient in graphic design, branding and visual identity, as well as social media design. Additionally, experienced in social media management and content writing, making a well-rounded professional in both design and digital content creation.
